ovdesc.p: CHECK.DOCUMENT is the input application form used to capture flag details for customer Onboarding process workflow.

desc.p: To indicate, whether customer photograph is received during the process.
To indicate, if welcome letter needs to be printed or not. Display option Yes/No.
To indicate, whether Proof of Identity is received from customer.
Field specifies the address documents type, which includes Statement and Utility.
To indicate, if black list check is completed for the customer. This is an auto updated field in the workflow.
3-10 alphanumeric customer mnemonic or 1-10 numeric character
Must be a valid CUSTOMER number or mnemonic.
Field Specifies the Identity document type, which includes License, National Id, Passport.
To indicate, whether Proof of Address is received from customer.
To indicate, if Signature card is updated with customer signature, before the process is completed.
To indicate, whether welcome pack is provided to the customer, before the process is completed.
